summary: Bandleader Kay Kyser takes his troupe of nutty musicians, goofball comics and pretty girl singers on a tour around the world to entertain the troops during World War II.
cast: Kay Kyser|Mischa Auer|Joan Davis|Marcy McGuire|Wally Brown|Alan Carney|Kay Kyser Band|M.A. Bogue|Georgia Carroll|Harry Babbitt|Sully Mason|Julie Conway|Diane Pendleton|Jack|Mac|Al Norman|Jadin Wong|Sung Li|Lucienne & Ashour|Philip Ahn|John Albright|Jack Alfred|Nils Althin|Gale Amber|Eugene Anderson Jr.|Robert Armstrong|Edward Astran|Joan Barclay|Walter Bonn|Esther Brodelet|Don Bryan|Bruce Cameron|Claire Carleton|Fred Cavens|Peter Chong|Richard Clarke|Barbara Coleman|Chester Conklin|James Courtney|Julius Cramer|Louise Currie|Kenneth Cutler|Marcel De la Brosse|Victor De Linsky|John Dilson|Dan Dowling|William Dyer Jr.|Fred Essler|George Ford|Arno Frey|Edmund Glover|George Golden|Roland Got|Henry Guttman|Barbara Hale|Sherry Hall|Mary Halsey|Charles Heard|George Hoagland|Leyland Hodgson|Selmer Jackson|John Jenkins|Allen Jung|Paul Kay|Don Kemp|Daun Kennedy|Colin Kenny|Mike Killian|Red Knight|Faith Kruger|Rosemary La Planche|Ivan Lebedeff|Rolf Lindau|Ralph Littlefield|Stanley Logan|Mary MacLaren|William Manning|Norman Mayes|Renny McEvoy|Louis Mercier|Mal Merrihugh|Josh Milton|Lee Moore|Carl Neubert|Shirley O'Hara|Clarence Peterson|John Piffle|Frank Puglia|Terrance Ray|Duncan Renaldo|Georges Renavent|Joe Roach|Carl Saxe|Dick Scott|Bernard Sell|Ray Spiker|Arnold Stanford|Margie Stewart|Gene Stone|Cliff Storey|Charles Straight|Drake Thornton|Bud Townsend|Lee Trent|Buford Turner|Joan Valerie|Wilhelm von Brincken|Hansel Warner|James Waters|James Westerfield|Crane Whitley|Billy Wilkerson|Bruce Wong
title: Around the World
